name: 2D Project- Romulos First King of Rome Sprite
name_original: 2D Project- Romulos First King of Rome Sprite
description:
2D Project- Romulos First King of Rome Sprite is a game developed by ChibiLordCthulhu. It was originally released in 2019.
2D Project- Romulos First King of Rome Sprite is available on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
